name: MassCode Snippets
description: Search and retrieve snippets from MassCode with contextual learning.

preferences.name: MassCode Keyword
preferences.description: The keyword to activate the MassCode snippet search.

preferences.name: MassCode DB Path
preferences.description: Path to your MassCode database file. For V3 or earlier: db.json. For V4+: massCode.db

preferences.name: Copy/Paste Mode
preferences.description: Choose how to manage snippets: copy to the clipboard. (Only copy functionality is currently working).

preferences.name: Enable Contextual Learning
preferences.description: Enables selection history recording and uses it to prioritize relevant snippets based on the search context.

preferences.name: Smart Single Result Ratio (0.0-1.0)
preferences.description: If a snippet's selection count for a query exceeds this ratio (e.g., 0.9 for 90%) of total selections for that query, show only that snippet. Set to 0 or an invalid value to disable. Example: 0.75

preferences.name: MassCode Version
preferences.description: Select your MassCode version. V3 and earlier use JSON files (db.json). V4+ use SQLite databases (massCode.db). When upgrading to V4+, MassCode automatically migrates your JSON data to SQLite format.
